title: FSX - Milviz Bell 407
description:
By request, here is a working 407.  I have verified with several people that this copy works.  If you have issues, check your own machine, cause its NOT this installer.  Milviz recommends disabling your anti-virus prior to installation.  Do as you wish, but that's what they say, and that's what WE did.  As always, if you like it, BUY it!  Support great developers!

*** YOU MUST HAVE 7-Zip TO PROPERLY EXTRACT!!! ***

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

High Performance and Packed with Features!

The MV 407 model depicted in this package is a highly detailed replica of its real-life counterpart. The model was created by using high quality digital photos and many, many countless hours of testing, revising and testing again!

Outstanding features of this aircraft are:

-Realistic startup and shutdowns

-Realistic systems and avionics

-High quality external model using normal and specular maps

-High resolution paint kit

-High quality sound set recorded from a real 407

-Custom realistic DX10/DX11 night lighting, landing lights and custom effects.

-Flight dynamics tested and tuned by real pilots. The aircraft flies just like its real world counterpart! By Brandon Filer and Chuck Jodry!

-Lots of liveries include



Product Support

NONE THIS IS TPB!!



System Requirements


This product requires FSX SP2 or P3D. Note: the Flight 1 version doesn't support V2. It is also designed for newer systems. Minimum requirements are 2.6 Core 2 Duo, 1024mb Video Card and 1.2 Gigs of free disk space. Optimal requirements are higher.

Windows XP is NOT supported.

***Support for P3D is not supplied at this time though the installer does allow for it. DX 10 is not supported but apparently it works.***
